Reason: The configuration option 'includeAndroidLdpiTvdpi' does not directly involve any performance-related operations that are time-expensive or memory-expensive within its related code. It simply determines whether to include ldpi and tvdpi density descriptors in the list of AndroidDensityDescriptors based on a boolean value. This decision does not lead to notable performance variations at the system level. Therefore, the configuration is not performance-sensitive.
